sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_nb_action.NextBestActionRankingImpl</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>NextBestActionRankingImpl</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var NextBestActionRankingImpl = Class.create();
NextBestActionRankingImpl.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getActionScore: function(actionOrders, ruleOrderObj) {
        var intraRuleStep = parseFloat(gs.getProperty(sn_nb_action.Constants.RECOMMENDATION_ORDER_WEIGHT));
        var interRuleStep = parseFloat(gs.getProperty(sn_nb_action.Constants.RULE_ORDER_WEIGHT));
        var frequencyWeight = parseFloat(gs.getProperty(sn_nb_action.Constants.FREQUENCY_WEIGHT));
        var frequency = actionOrders.length,
            max = 0,
            finalScore;
        for (var i = 0; i < frequency; i++) {
            var intraOrder = actionOrders[i].getIntraOrder();
            var interOrder = ruleOrderObj[actionOrders[i].getRule()];
            var currentScore = Math.pow(intraRuleStep, intraOrder - 1) * Math.pow(interRuleStep, interOrder - 1);
            if (currentScore > max)
                max = currentScore;
        }
        finalScore = max + frequency * frequencyWeight;
        return finalScore;
    },

    type: 'NextBestActionRankingImpl'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-01 01:30:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2a0220720f22201076bd445485767e7c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NextBestActionRankingImpl</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Recommended Actions" source="sn_nb_action">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Recommended Actions">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2a0220720f22201076bd445485767e7c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-04 02:40:18</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
